title: Solar Orbiter Magnetometer L2 Data - T. Horbury (The Blackett Laboratory, Imperial College London)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'EPOCH' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/solar-orbiter/mag/science/l2/vso-burst/2020/solo_l2_mag-vso-burst_20201226_v02.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 43.0053% of the 2377972 timesteps. Cadence = 15630573 [ns] = PT0.015631S.
info.contact: T. Horbury @ The Blackett Laboratory, Imperial College London

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Epoch encoded as Terrestrial Time on rotating Earth geoid, ns since J2000

parameters.name: B_VSO
parameters.description: Magnetic field vector in VSO coordinates
